metadata.description: A comic book "creature feature" from the co-creator and artist of LAST BLOOD! A legend of folklore, the pterodactyl-sized "bigfoot of birds" they call King Crow, has been killing people throughout history. If you ever harm a crow, by accident or otherwise, you and your loved ones are marked for death. After young newlywed Jack Feldin survives a fiery car accident that leaves his best friend dead and a nest of crows injured, King Crow pays him a visit and his entire family is put in jeopardy.
metadata.name: Crow Scare
